name: Old Fort
description: The history of Zanzibar island lays in this Old Fort, there's plenty to learn and experience. The Old Fort, also known as the Arab Fort and by other names, is a fortification located in Stone Town, the capital of Zanzibar. It is the oldest building and a major visitor attraction of Stone Town. It is located on the main seafront, adjacent to another landmark building of the city, the House of Wonders, and facing the Forodhani Gardens.

name: Paje Beach
description: Excellent beach and perfect for a morning walk. Plenty of restaurants and amenities nearby, never feels too crowded or busy, evening during the day. If snorkeling or water sports are your thing, plenty of options too.

name: Jozani Forest
description: Jozani Forest is a beautiful experience especially if you're a nature lover! Home to the rare Zanzibar Red Colobus Monkey, it offers a serene escape with lush greenery, diverse wildlife, and breathtaking mangrove boardwalks. The guided tours are both informative and engaging, making it a truly memorable experience.

name: Jambiani Beach
description: Plenty of white sand beaches..clear water and lots of small beach lodges you can choose around at your budget.

name: Kiwengwa Beach
description: A perfect paradise. Beautiful white sand and unbelievably warm sea . A place that has it all - get a great tan, eat amazing food, swim in the warmest waters and meet Maasai.

name: Fukuchani Ruins & Cave
description: The ruins are historically interesting. It was slavemarket in the beginning & later converted to a trading building. There is a school on the opposite site.

name: The Cave
description: The cave is a 50 metre round sink hole in the middle of a small jungle in Jambiani,  offers a unique experience for adventurous nature-lovers, snorkellers, divers and people interested in Swahili Culture.

name: Tortoise Sanctuary
description: Worth visiting! The tortoises are so lovely! There are about 200 tortoises on the island at different ages. You can touch them and take a lot of pictures.
